rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
special_text:
I – Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
II – You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
III – Lands you control gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color” until end of turn.
